title: Usage
description: A collection of beautifully designed components that are accessiable for everyone. Just copy and paste the code and use it right away.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.p2: Also check out these official docs for these libraries on installing them based on your environment. <tailwind>Tailwindcss</tailwind>, <framer>Framer Motion</framer>
requirements.p3: For some components, you may also need to install other libraries. Please watch for the comment when you copy the code for installing instructions. Find a component you like, copy and paste the code to your project ðŸŽ‰
